description: color print; three girls and one woman at left dancing with joined hands; man's face looking at woman in ULC; other figures seated on the ground at right in middle and background, with standing boy flying a kite at center
marks:
Signature and Inscription

on back, in pencil: [ LRC in the print, in blue: [A LEPÈRE / SC]
provenance: [C. & J. Goodfriend, New York, until 2002; sold in September for ROOO, to Harry Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (2002-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Dimanche aux Fortifs
